metadata.Title: CVE-2017-6060 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - negligible.
metadata.Description: Stack-based buffer overflow in jstest_main.c in mujstest in Artifex Software, Inc. MuPDF 1.10a allows remote attackers to have unspecified impact via a crafted image.

notes.Note: sbeattie> mujstest is built during build, but not included in binary package

criterions.comment: mupdf: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
